title: The Adventures of Horace, George and Ingle - The Rise of the Black Knight
description: Life is going exactly as planned for Galray’s royal twins, Horace and George. The chess-playing teenagers have excelled in sword and bow training and are well on the way to knighthood and their rightful place on the king’s council. Their older brother, Ingle, is next-in-line to the throne, but he’s just as content spending time in the castle’s kitchen with the royal bakers and learning his noble history. When a peculiar lightning storm causes damage to a nearby village, the brothers get caught up in an investigation ordered by their father, King Reynold. It isn’t long before the peaceful land they’ve always known is on the verge of collapse and they are forced to put every skill they’ve practiced to the test. In a race to save the kingdom from an eternity of despair, they unravel a mystery makes them question everything they’ve ever known. The quest leads the brothers to Rifflesly, a strange little man who speaks in frustrating riddles, nevertheless pointing them toward the answers they seek. But first, the trio has to survive a perilous journey to the Oracle. Rogue dragons, myths and betrayal lay ahead as the three brothers are forced to lead and become men.
author: H.W. Cumming
